title:
Technology News | ⚡Indian CEO Felt ‘Bored’ With Microsoft’s High-Salary Job 
in US, Launched Startup for Farmers: Report
text: By Team Latestly Despite drawing Rs 1 crore salary per month, Ruchit Garg decided to establish a startup company Harvesting to help the small farmers. The reason for quitting job back in 2011 was feeling "bored" and wanting to do something related to agriculture.
